channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Is the New York Times neutral on the future of democracy?
item.source:markdown: Is the New York Times neutral on the future of democracy?

item.description: How Twitter’s descent into chaos is paving the way for a new web. (I don't agree that Twitter has descended into chaos, but it is time for a new web.)
item.source:markdown: How Twitter’s descent into chaos is paving the way for a new web. (I don't agree that Twitter has descended into chaos, but it _is_ time for a new web.)

item.description: Harvard Crimson: New York Times, Get out of My School.
item.source:markdown: Harvard Crimson: New York Times, Get out of My School.

item.description: Breaking Bad in one minute.
item.source:markdown: Breaking Bad in one minute.

item.description: You gotta wonder if journalists could find some actual news to write about.
item.source:markdown: You gotta wonder if journalists could find some actual news to write about.

item.description: I really don't believe Trump is our problem. I think the problem is journalism.
item.source:markdown: I really don't believe Trump is our problem. I think the problem is journalism.

item.description: Another bullshit story concocted by the NYT. I'm not there now, but I don't believe for a second that there's any unusual antisemitism at Harvard.
item.source:markdown: Another bullshit story concocted by the NYT. I'm not there now, but I don't believe for a second that there's any unusual antisemitism at Harvard.

item.description: Fastest-Growing Black Hole Is Eating a Sun Per Day. (That's a pretty good headline!)
item.source:markdown: Fastest-Growing Black Hole Is Eating a Sun Per Day. (That's a pretty good headline!)

item.description: 5G is eating cable’s lunch.
item.source:markdown: 5G is eating cable’s lunch.

item.description: I think it's wrong to say Mastodon is a Twitter rival. It's not what it is. It's something different.
item.source:markdown: I think it's wrong to say Mastodon is a Twitter rival. It's not what it is. It's something different.

item.description: I was writing a story about sizing ski boots and asked ChatGPT to make an illustration for the story for me.
item.source:markdown: I was writing a story about sizing ski boots and asked ChatGPT to make an illustration for the story for me.

item.description: Why The New York Times might win its copyright lawsuit against OpenAI.
item.source:markdown: Why The New York Times might win its copyright lawsuit against OpenAI.

item.description: Millions of us see the problem. What are we going to do about it??
item.source:markdown: Millions of us see the problem. What are we going to do about it??

item.source:markdown: Measles erupts in Florida school where 11% of kids are unvaccinated.

item.description: Marge in Fargo: "There's more to life than a little money. Don't you know that?"
item.source:markdown: Marge in Fargo: "There's more to life than a little money. Don't you know that?"

item.description: I swear to god John Lennon wrote the anthem for 2024 back in 1971.

item.description: New FeedLand feature: Red icons for feeds that are in error.
item.source:markdown: New FeedLand feature: Red icons for feeds that are in error.

item.description: The NYT says the resistance is exhausted. Bullshit. We're very well rested. And the NYT is a den of assholes.
item.source:markdown: The NYT says the resistance is exhausted. Bullshit. We're very well rested. And the NYT is a den of assholes.

item.description: Twitter front-end Nitter dies as Musk wins war against third-party services.
item.source:markdown: Twitter front-end Nitter dies as Musk wins war against third-party services.

item.description: Just watched the cringeworthy HBO miniseries about John Adams. This NYT review nails it. Too bad they cast the wrong actor to play the leading role.
item.source:markdown: Just watched the cringeworthy HBO miniseries about John Adams. This NYT review nails it. Too bad they cast the wrong actor to play the leading role.

item.description: The world economy never recovered from the COVID-19 pandemic.
item.source:markdown: The world economy never recovered from the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.description: “He needs to figure out where he is going to raise $500-plus million over a short period of time,” Cohen continued.
item.source:markdown: “He needs to figure out where he is going to raise $500-plus million over a short period of time,” Cohen continued.

item.source:markdown: Ghost has a feature called "recommendations" which is a blogroll that can be two-way.

item.description: A new dating app: You must have at least a 675 credit score to use it.
item.source:markdown: A new dating app: You must have at least a 675 credit score to use it.

item.description: Finally, the New York Times focuses on an actual issue that should be of great concern to every American voter.
item.source:markdown: Finally, the New York Times focuses on an actual issue that should be of great concern to every American voter.

item.description: Kia dealers marking up EV9 despite warnings.
item.source:markdown: Kia dealers marking up EV9 despite warnings.

item.description: I've been wanting to teach ChatGPT how I work, as I would an developer partner, so we can get more efficient over time and tackle more ambitious projects. Eventually I'd like to work with it on porting Frontier to Linux. It's not something any of my human colleagues have been able to help with, but I don't doubt that ChatGPT could do it.
item.source:markdown: I've been wanting to teach ChatGPT how I work, as I would an developer partner, so we can get more efficient over time and tackle more ambitious projects. Eventually I'd like to work with it on porting Frontier to Linux. It's not something any of my human colleagues have been able to help with, but I don't doubt that ChatGPT could do it.

item.description: Jimmy Carter’s Long Goodbye.
item.source:markdown: Jimmy Carter’s Long Goodbye.

item.description: I’d like journos to wipe the grins off their faces, buckle down, and take their responsibility seriously.
item.source:markdown: I’d like journos to wipe the grins off their faces, buckle down, and take their responsibility seriously.

item.description: Seeing the headline of this op-ed in the Washington Post, I wondered who the author was responding to. You have to wade thru a lot of other stuff before you get to the point, only Repub loony birds, of course, say Trump is America’s Navalny. Does this bs really deserve a response from the WP?
item.source:markdown: Seeing the headline of this op-ed in the Washington Post, I wondered who the author was responding to. You have to wade thru a lot of other stuff before you get to the point, only Repub loony birds, of course, say Trump is America’s Navalny. Does this bs really deserve a response from the WP?
